sys_script_include.description:
This is a Utility for the Conditional Portal Redirect Application to query the Portal Redirection Rule table. It can be used for any given logged-in user to identify which portal a user should be redirected to. This can be incorporated into a custom SPEntryPage script or called from any other redirect methods required.
Call using the following syntax:
var portalRules = new x_17973_conditiona.PRRPortalRuleUtils();
portalRules.getRedirectRule(); //-- For the object portalRules.getRedirectRule().name; //-- For the rule Name portalRules.ggetRedirectType(); //-- For the rule's redirect type (platform_ui or portal) portalRules.getRedirectPortalSuffix(); //-- For the Portal suffix portalRules.getRedirectPortalObject(); //-- For the Portal Object
sys_script_include.name: PRRPortalRuleUtils
